00010 Rendering::Rendering(const std::string &name, const Ogre::SceneTypeMask typeMask) {
00011 
00012         this->deltaT = 0;
00013         this->finish = false;
00014         this->initRendering(name, typeMask);
00015         this->initInputOutput();
00016         this->initGUI();
00017 }
00018 
00019 void Rendering::run(void) {
00020         this->pRoot->startRendering();
00021 }

00023 void Rendering::initGround(const std::string& fileMesh, const bool shadows, const int scale) {
00024 
00025         Ogre::Entity *pEntity;
00026 
00027         //this->pSceneManager->setWorldGeometry(filename);
00028         pEntity = this->pSceneManager->createEntity("Ground", fileMesh);
00029         pEntity->setCastShadows(shadows);
00030 
00031         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeGround");
00032         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeGround")->attachObject(pEntity);
00033         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeGround")->scale(scale, scale, scale);
00034         //this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeGround")->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 0, 0));
00035 }

00077 bool Rendering::frameStarted(const Ogre::FrameEvent& evt)  {
00078 
00079         this->deltaT = evt.timeSinceLastFrame;
00080 
00081         if(this->pMouse) {
00082                 this->pMouse->capture();
00083         }
00084         if(this->pKeyboard) {
00085                 this->pKeyboard->capture();
00086         }
00087         return (!this->finish);
00088 }

00090 Rendering::~Rendering(void) {
00091 
00092         if(this->pRoot) {
00093                 delete this->pRoot;
00094         }
00095         if(this->pRenderWindow) {
00096                 Ogre::WindowEventUtilities::removeWindowEventListener(this->pRenderWindow, this);
00097                 windowClosed(this->pRenderWindow);
00098                 //delete this->pRenderWindow;
00099         }
00100         if(this->pSceneManager) {
00101                 this->pSceneManager->destroyQuery(this->pRaySceneQuery);
00102                 delete this->pSceneManager;
00103         }
00104         /*if(this->pViewport) {
00105                 delete this->pViewport;
00106         }*/
00107         if(this->pCamera) {
00108                 delete this->pCamera;
00109         }
00110         /*if(this->pInputManager) {
00111                 delete this->pInputManager;
00112         }*/
00113         if(this->pMouse) {
00114                 delete this->pMouse;
00115         }
00116         if(this->pKeyboard) {
00117                 delete this->pKeyboard;
00118         }
00119         if(this->pRaySceneQuery) {
00120                 delete this->pRaySceneQuery;
00121         }
00122         if(this->pGUIRenderer) {
00123                 delete this->pGUIRenderer;
00124         }
00125         if(this->pGUISystem) {
00126                 delete this->pGUISystem;
00127         }
00128 }

00130 void Rendering::initRendering(const std::string &name, const Ogre::SceneTypeMask typeMask) {
00131 
00132         std::string nameConfigFile = name + ".cfg";
00133         std::string nameLogFile = name + ".log";
00134 
00135         this->pRoot = new Ogre::Root("./plugins.cfg",nameConfigFile,nameLogFile);
00136         if(!this->pRoot->restoreConfig())
00137         {
00138                 if(!this->pRoot->showConfigDialog())
00139                 {
00140                         this->~Rendering();
00141                 }
00142         }
00143         Ogre::LogManager::getSingletonPtr()->logMessage("*** Initializing Rendering ***");
00144         this->pRenderWindow = this->pRoot->initialise(true, name);
00145 
00146         this->pSceneManager = this->pRoot->createSceneManager(typeMask, name);
00147         this->pSceneManager->setAmbientLight(Ogre::ColourValue(0.15, 0.15, 0.15));
00148         this->pSceneManager->setShadowTechnique(Ogre::SHADOWTYPE_STENCIL_ADDITIVE);
00149 
00150         this->pCamera = this->pSceneManager->createCamera("Camera");
00151         this->pCamera->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 0, 0));
00152         this->pCamera->lookAt(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,0));
00153         this->pCamera->setNearClipDistance(5);
00154         //this->pCamera->setFarClipDistance(1000);
00155 
00156         this->pViewport = this->pRenderWindow->addViewport(pCamera);
00157         this->pViewport->setOverlaysEnabled(false);
00158         this->pViewport->setClearEveryFrame(true);
00159         this->pViewport->setBackgroundColour(Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0));
00160 
00161         this->pCamera->setAspectRatio(Ogre::Real(this->pViewport->getActualWidth())/Ogre::Real(this->pViewport->getActualHeight()));
00162 
00163         Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation("./data/models/","FileSystem","General");
00164         Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation("./data/terrains/","FileSystem","General");
00165         Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation("./data/skybox/","FileSystem","General");
00166 
00167         Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseAllResourceGroups();
00168 
00169         this->pRoot->addFrameListener(this);
00170         Ogre::WindowEventUtilities::addWindowEventListener(this->pRenderWindow, this);
00171 
00172 
00173         //this->pRaySceneQuery->setWorldFragmentType(Ogre::SceneQuery::WFT_SINGLE_INTERSECTION);
00174 }

00176 void Rendering::initInputOutput() {
00177 
00178         OIS::ParamList paramList;
00179         size_t windowHnd = 0;
00180         std::ostringstream windowHndStr;
00181 
00182         unsigned int width, height, depth;
00183         int top, left;
00184 
00185         Ogre::LogManager::getSingletonPtr()->logMessage("*** Initializing InputOutput ***");
00186         this->pRenderWindow->getCustomAttribute("WINDOW", &windowHnd);
00187         windowHndStr << windowHnd;
00188         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("WINDOW"), windowHndStr.str()));
00189 
00190         #if defined OIS_WIN32_PLATFORM
00191         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("w32_mouse"), std::string("DISCL_FOREGROUND" )));
00192         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("w32_mouse"), std::string("DISCL_NONEXCLUSIVE")));
00193         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("w32_keyboard"), std::string("DISCL_FOREGROUND")));
00194         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("w32_keyboard"), std::string("DISCL_NONEXCLUSIVE")));
00195         #elif defined OIS_LINUX_PLATFORM
00196         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("x11_mouse_grab"), std::string("false")));
00197         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("x11_mouse_hide"), std::string("false")));
00198         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("x11_keyboard_grab"), std::string("false")));
00199         paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("XAutoRepeatOn"), std::string("true")));
00200         #endif
00201 
00202         this->pInputManager = OIS::InputManager::createInputSystem(paramList);
00203 
00204         //creation de l'objet clavier.
00205         this->pKeyboard = dynamic_cast<OIS::Keyboard*>(this->pInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISKeyboard, true));
00206         this->pKeyboard->setEventCallback(this);
00207 
00208         //creation de l'objet souris.
00209         this->pMouse = dynamic_cast<OIS::Mouse*>(this->pInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISMouse, true));
00210         this->pMouse->setEventCallback(this);
00211 
00212         //taille de la fenetre de l'application pour la gestion de la souris.
00213         const OIS::MouseState &state = this->pMouse->getMouseState();
00214         this->pRenderWindow->getMetrics(width, height, depth, left, top);
00215         state.width = width;
00216         state.height = height;
00217 }

00219 void Rendering::initGUI() {
00220 
00221         Ogre::LogManager::getSingletonPtr()->logMessage("*** Initializing GUI ***");
00222 
00223         this->pGUIRenderer = new CEGUI::OgreCEGUIRenderer(this->pRenderWindow, Ogre::RENDER_QUEUE_OVERLAY, false, 3000, this->pSceneManager);
00224         this->pGUISystem = new CEGUI::System(this->pGUIRenderer);
00225         CEGUI::Logger::getSingleton().setLoggingLevel(CEGUI::Informative);
00226 
00227         CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().setImage(CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getDefaultMouseCursor());
00228 
00229         //center cursor
00230         const OIS::MouseState &state = this->pMouse->getMouseState();
00231         //CEGUI::Point mousePos = CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().getPosition();
00232         CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseMove(state.X.abs/*-mousePos.d_x*/,state.Y.abs/*-mousePos.d_y*/);
00233 
00234         //CEGUI::SchemeManager::getSingleton().loadScheme((CEGUI::utf8*)"skin.scheme");
00235         //CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().setImage("skinMouse", "MouseArrow");
00236         //this->pGUISystem->setDefaultMouseCursor((CEGUI::utf8*)"skinMouse", (CEGUI::utf8*)"MouseArrow");
00237         //this->pGUISystem->setDefaultFont((CEGUI::utf8*)"BlueHighway-12");
00238 }

00240 const CEGUI::MouseButton Rendering::convertButton(const OIS::MouseButtonID buttonID) const {
00241 
00242         switch (buttonID) {
00243         case OIS::MB_Left:
00244         return CEGUI::LeftButton;
00245 
00246         case OIS::MB_Right:
00247         return CEGUI::RightButton;
00248 
00249         case OIS::MB_Middle:
00250         return CEGUI::MiddleButton;
00251 
00252         default:
00253         return CEGUI::LeftButton;
00254         }
00255 }
